ValidationRule.description: Ensures that the other phone field is properly validated.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: IF( OR(ISCHANGED(PersonOtherPhone ) && NOT(ISNULL(PersonOtherPhone )) && NOT(ISBLANK(PersonOtherPhone )) && !REGEX(PersonOtherPhone ,'^\\d{10,25}$'), ISNEW() && NOT(ISNULL(PersonOtherPhone )) && NOT(ISBLANK(PersonOtherPhone )) && !REGEX(PersonOtherPhone ,'^\\d{10,25}$')),true,false)
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Invalid format entered for other phone. The minimum number of digits should be 10
